title: 1/6/1 darius flashed into our grouped up team and got a triple kill by himself.
body: Can we actually gut this champion instead of just giving him lovetaps.

replies.body: none of u were at full health if this actually happened
More like all of them were probobly around 200 or less hp.
was the whole team made of squishy champs?
my guess is you just finished a teamfight and you were all "grouped" with extremely low HP. right?

> [{quoted}](name=Dasdi96,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tF2ojV8U,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-23T02:23:46.055+0000)
>
> Can we actually gut this champion instead of just giving him lovetaps.

Were you all just grouped right next to him?

Did no one CC him afterwards? Did Malphite/amumu jump in and ult?

Was someone else on the other team fed as well?

These are details you are leaving out in a complaint thread.
Then they'd have to admit that their rework was a failure and they certainly don't like doing that.
It is all about the money anyways. They have to sell those Darius skins before they nerf him to hard.
